[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_type=”grad” bg_grad=”background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #232A34), color-stop(88%, #263E5A));background: -moz-linear-gradient(left,#232A34 0%,#263E5A 88%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left,#232A34 0%,#263E5A 88%);background: -o-linear-gradient(left,#232A34 0%,#263E5A 88%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(left,#232A34 0%,#263E5A 88%);background: linear-gradient(left,#232A34 0%,#263E5A 88%);”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600917882524{padding-left: 45px !important;}”]

Linux Server Consulting and Managed Services

A competent and reliable team of Linux professionals based in North America.
Server Maintenance and Patching
Security Audits, Pen Testing, EDR
24x7 Monitoring & Support
High Availabilty Services
DevOps, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes
View All Services[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” type=”vc_default”][vc_column]
[vc_single_image image=”57402″ img_size=”300×200″ alignment=”center” image_hovers=”false” lazy_loading=”true”][vc_single_image image=”57403″ img_size=”300×200″ alignment=”center” image_hovers=”false” lazy_loading=”true”][vc_single_image image=”57404″ img_size=”300×200″ alignment=”center” image_hovers=”false” lazy_loading=”true”][vc_single_image image=”57405″ img_size=”300×200″ alignment=”center” image_hovers=”false” lazy_loading=”true”][vc_single_image image=”57406″ img_size=”300×200″ alignment=”center” image_hovers=”false” lazy_loading=”true”][vc_single_image image=”57407″ img_size=”300×200″ alignment=”center” image_hovers=”false” lazy_loading=”true”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1602045054267{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-xs-12″]

It’s hard to find a competent IT partner you can trust

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1600919949623{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]You may have hired external consultants in the past, but they didn’t have enough expertise to keep your systems running smoothly. Or worse, they weren’t reliable enough to deliver on time and left you feeling frustrated and insecure.

You may have tried to solve your problems in-house. But your people have better things to do than solve pesky bugs or google their way through a complicated installation of a new tool all day.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1601340683289{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]

With Crafty Penguins, you can stop worrying about your IT and focus on growing your business

[vc_column_text]We are a team of competent and reliable Linux consultants that will carefully listen to you, get the job done fast and be there for you when you need us.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1600919938222{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1601778175028{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Get peace of mind

Enjoy the comfort of knowing that a reliable team of experts has your back at all times, making sure your systems stay operational 24/7.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1601778181872{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Optimize & secure your systems

Our experts will tune up your systems to run faster and secure using fewer resources to keep your clients happy even when your business scales.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1601778187756{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Focus on your business

Don’t make your own people waste days, fixing pesky bugs or installing new tools. Letting us take care of that will be faster (and probably cheaper).
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” margin_top=”55″ margin_bottom=”45″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1573115998411{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.04) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1600926323719{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_single_image image=”59471″ img_size=”80×62″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1611708509500{margin-top: -25px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;}”]

Fast, efficient and reliable team of experts

We came to Crafty Penguins when our company was experiencing rapid growth. Our website traffic was increasing daily, and we needed someone capable of building a reliable, hardened production environment that could easily scale.

The team of Crafty Penguins was fast and efficient in getting their infrastructure set up and monitoring our production servers. That alone eased a lot of fears of a catastrophic failure on our side. They listened to us to identify the job that needed to get done, and they did it reliably and professionally with great communication throughout the process.

We’ve been working with Crafty Penguins ever since to resolve other issues and implement a series of further enhancements. It’s comforting to know that we’re working with experts that will be there for us when we need them.

Greg Hansen, Architect, BacklotCars, USA

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” disable_element=”yes” type=”vc_default” full_width_padding_left=”40″ full_width_padding_right=”40″ full_width_margin_top=”0″ full_width_margin_bottom=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1600481830811{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-sm-offset-1″ css=”.vc_custom_1573122203725{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”]

Our Services

[/vc_column][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” margin_top=”55″ margin_bottom=”45″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1602045204789{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column]

Our Services

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Maintenance & Support

[vc_column_text]

  • Proactive patching and health checks to catch issues before causing outages
  • Monitoring & health checks
  • Fixing urgent issues like production bugs, hack attacks or performance problems
  • Supporting your developers with our knowledge and tools
  • Ad hoc support via Slack, email or phone

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Setup and Migrations

[vc_column_text]

  • Linux server setup & migrations
  • Cloud service management
  • Web Server performance analysis & optimization
  • Enterprise level WordPress setup and optimization
  • DB Server performance analysis & optimization
  • DevOps, CI/CD, and Kubernetes implementation

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Security & Endpoint Protection

[vc_column_text]

  • Endpoint Detection & Response (EDR)
  • Vulnerability Scan and Reporting
  • Penetration Testing
  • Security Hardening
  • File Integrity Monitoring
  • Host-based Intrusion Detection System (HIDS)
  • Compliance & Security Management

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” margin_top=”55″ margin_bottom=”45″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1600482323977{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column]

View All Services
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” margin_top=”55″ margin_bottom=”45″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1602045189294{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.04) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_column]

Our Technology Stack

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924313312{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-sm-offset-2″]

Linux Distributions

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]Debian
Ubuntu
CentOS
Red Hat
Rocky Linux
Suse[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924321015{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-sm-offset-2″]

DevOps

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]Salt Stack
Docker
Jenkins
Kubernetes
Ansible
ELK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924327039{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Cloud

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]Digital Ocean
Azure
Google
Amazon AWS
OpenStack
OVH[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924333517{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Databases

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]PostgreSQL
MySQL
MariaDB
MongoDB[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion c_icon=”” active_section=”0″ no_fill=”true” collapsible_all=”true”][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-caret-right” add_icon=”true” title=”More Technologies” tab_id=”More-Technologies”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924341292{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Enterprise Storage

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]CEPH
ZFS
GlusterFS
SAN/NAS
RAID[/vc_column_text]

Web & Proxy Servers

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]Apache
Squid
Varnish
NGinx
JBoss
Tomcat[/vc_column_text]

Caching Systems

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]NGINX
Memcache
Redis[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924346355{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Programming Languages

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]PHP
Python
Java
Ruby
Node.JS[/vc_column_text]

Virtualization

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]KVM
LXC
Proxmox
VMWare
HyperV[/vc_column_text]

Networking

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]HA Proxy
IP Tables
Quagga
OSPF
BGP
VRRP
IPVS
VLANs[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924356829{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Amazon Cloud Services

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]CloudFormation
CloudWatch
CodePipeline
Elastic Commpute
Elastic Container Services
Relational Database Service
Route53 – DNS
S3 – Bulk storage
VPC – Private Cloud[/vc_column_text]

VPN Tunnelling

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]OpenVPN
OpenSWAN
StrongSWAN
WireGuard
MLVPN
GRE
SDWAN[/vc_column_text]

Monitoring and Metrics

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]Prometheus
InfluxDB
Grafana[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

File Systems

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]CephFS
Gluster
NFS
CIFS
ZFS[/vc_column_text]

High Availability

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]IPVS
HA Proxy
VRRP
KeepaliveD[/vc_column_text]

Log management

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]ElasticSearch
LogStash
Kibana[/vc_column_text]

Web Frameworks

[vc_column_text el_class=”linespacesmall”]GitLab
Atlassian products
WordPress
Magento
Drupal
Django[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924341292{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600924346355{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1573128875541{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_single_image image=”59471″ img_size=”80×62″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1602290272814{margin-top: -25px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;}”]

A capable and trustworthy partner that allows us to focus on our core business

Having Crafty Penguins manage our systems saves us time so that we can focus on our core business. At the moment, we serve 25,000+ customers with only two of our own staff members.

The team of Crafty Penguins has very in-depth knowledge, is capable of investigating the issues a lot deeper than an average IT provider and is always there for us when we need them.

Herman van Rhijn, Technical Director, Kliksafe B.V. Nunspeet, Netherlands

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1601355738869{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_single_image image=”59471″ img_size=”80×62″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1602290327781{margin-top: -25px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;}”]

Creative Solutions, Improved Page Load Times, Experience, and Knowledge Sharing with our Developers

Crafty Penguins has been our #1 IT support for the past 5 years. They are a real team that works together to solve our IT issues in a friendly and professional manner. They react fast, are available 24/7 and always follow up to make sure the issues have been resolved. It’s a great relief to have a Linux support team that actually knows what they are doing.

Laurie Coops, Office Manager, Cedar Care Clinic, Canada

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” margin_top=”55″ margin_bottom=”45″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1602263554281{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.04) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1602263561454{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Interested? Let’s talk.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1601606560201{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Interested in working with us? Use the form below to schedule a free 20-minute call to discuss what you need and how we can help.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
